name: Get That Bread (itch)
description:
Do you love bread? Do you want more bread? Well, you can "Get That Bread" in this new desktop game! Click on the bread to get more, and buy bakeries to bake bread just for you! Automate your production and become the bread king/queen.

Visit our website's GitHub page to view code and more information on the game!

https://github.com/911joeblack/Get-That-Bread/tree/Isaacs-branch

(Go to Isaacs-branch from [main] button for up to date details on the game)

Authors: Shivam Sudame, Joel Perez, Isaac Olvera, Xu Zhihui, Alexander Gomez, and Mialiani Phommasa
